body:
Dear MegaSale Store,

Thank you for the notification about your limited-time 70% off sale.

Could you please confirm the precise end time for this "today only" offer? Additionally, it would be helpful to know if there are any specific product categories or items excluded from this promotion.

Thank you for the clarification.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]

metadata.originalSubject: 🎉 LIMITED TIME: 70% OFF EVERYTHING! Act Now!

subject: Re: 🎉 LIMITED TIME: 70% OFF EVERYTHING! Act Now!
